alert.note: Alert for Chester; Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:23PM CDT until July 18 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fayette County in west Tennessee... Northern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Haywood County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Madison County in west Tennessee... West central Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 522 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brownsville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Whiteville, Silerton, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Hillville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Toone, Medon, Asbury, Allens, Christmasville, Hickory Point, Uptonville and Jones. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
